script.dataSelect: select specific_catalog as catalog_name, specific_schema as schema_name, routine_name as name from information_schema.routines where type_udt_name !='trigger' and specific_schema not in ('pg_catalog', 'information_schema')
script.templatesSelect: select routine_definition from information_schema.routines where type_udt_name !='trigger' and specific_schema not in ('pg_catalog', 'information_schema') and specific_catalog ='$catalog_name$' and specific_schema ='$schema_name$' and routine_name ='$name$'
